string_table.str: Repel the final Flood threat before it's too late.
Pavium's Mega Turrets are critical to defeating the menace.
We will fix this, Atriox. We only thought it wise to inform you of the threat.
W
I want actions, not words. I'm on my way.
I
I have spent months fortifying positions to continue the fight against the humans. Now I have to abandon them because of you!
Y
Voridus, Pavium! Do you know what your actions have cost me?
Find and reactivate the Sentinel defenses
Jump Pack Brutes are vital to navigating the Archive.
Be sure to make use of your incendiary gels, the enclosed spaces will work to your advantage.
As does the Flood. Tread carefully. This area will be rotten with Flood forms.
I
T
I told you I will fix this, Pavium. The means to reactivate the Sentinel Flood defenses should lie below.
Pavium, how far down is this facility? The lift still hasn't reached the bottom, it is endless!
Gather power to start up the salvage drills
Multiple Flood bursters have been detected in the area
If we can start the salvage drills, we can use them to cause a chain reaction and burn the parasite away!
The fissures! That whole area is honeycombed with explosive power.
We MUST reach that station, if we can't reactivate the Forerunner defenses we will have no chance against the parasite!
Voridus, my troops and I are nearly at your position at the salvage drills. Have you reached the Forerunner defense station?
I will start our extractors up immediately to start stockpiling power.
We barely even had time to establish a base before they besieged us!
We haven't the numbers, Pavium. Each time we kill one, another appears. The Flood is everywhere, scattered across every surface, every crack and fissure!
Some kind of Flood forms block the entrance to the station, it's as if they understand it's a threat to them.
Clear a path for the salvage operation
Valuable resources can be found amongst the wreckage from the crash site.
Unsurprising. No doubt he's picked a fight with some Sentinels there, but he should have reported in. No matter.
Good. If Voridus has listened to me, he'll be doing the same from outside of High Charity. Have you had word from him?
No, no further communications since he and his Brutes approached High Charity.
Pavium, our troops are en route to perform salvage extraction from the nearby ships.
Join and support Voridus' assault on High Charity.
Field anti-air units to combat the heavy Sentinel threat.
This war has taught me, Voridus. Stay your hand. Once we reach High Charity we need to move quickly to avoid the wrath of the Sentinels defending it.
And your men would do well to remember that whatever we find here belongs to Atriox.
Put a leash on them, Voridus! The terrain here is unsuitable for our power extractors. I am still working on a solution!
Yes, yes. I am well aware of what we face here. Hurry your preparations, old one, I already have troops on the ground! Voridus, out.
This war has tamed you, brother! Where is your Jiralhanae lust for adventure? That relic is ripe for plunder!
Pavium, we are ready to move to High Charity. My men are impatient for glory.
